short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will convert multiple values to selected delimiter format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will convert multiple values or rows to selected delimiter format.
This extension will help to prepare a delimited value from multiple rows. 
It has option to prepare it with single quote or double quote. 
Converted values will be saved in clipboard
Very useful tool to convert rows/space delimited/tab delimited values to comma separated  values (CSV). 
Output delimiter options : Comma/Pipe/Tilde/Colon/Semi colon
Wrapper options : single quote /double quote
